title: Wanna talk to someone at riot about a player in some trouble
body: I filed a ticket about this (#23696552) but i know thoes take a while to be seen to. If you add me in game (Abaranth) or email me at my account email i'd appriciate it.

replies.body:
It looks like you received a response from one of our specialists today.

Let me know if you have any questions.
